overview:
Danilo Leao is a serial entrepreneur & the founding general partner at Realise Ventures, an startup pool that helps bootstrap and fund startups in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Danilo has been bootstraping startups out in Latin America for ten years, and has worked with companies such as Computer Associates, Endeavor and Patagon. He also likes to run and bike when he wants to boost endorphin levels.

Danilo has been a business developent specialist in over 10 startup companies including: Carbon Compensation, Collective Food Intelligence â€“ Social Network, Blogs Aggregator, Traceability Software and Leading Farming e-Commerce Store, among many others.

My last enterprise [its being]: Polite - a leading Brazilian agribusiness e-commerce. We are leaving the operation, hiring a CEO. It was CertBeef’s spin-off.

SIFE Brazil: non-for-profit organization that “changes the world” when brings together the top leaders of today and tomorrow, to create a better and more sustainable world through the positive power of business. In 4 years in Brazil we’ve engaged 1.500 young entrepreneurs, 40 business leaders [C level] from Wal-Mart, Cargill, Kraft, KornFerry, Mckinsey, HSBC; and 43.000 families/year, in 6 Br states.

CertBeef / CertCoffee / CertCarbon - about traceability Special leverage and failure experiences (gov Model): From zero (foundation) to TOP.1 (recognized by Ministério da Agricultura e Pecuária), with operations in 6 states; until gov’s model stress (2008 close exports to European Union), and finnally taking the most difficult decision of shutting down this business, absorving its lieabilities until its end.
